name: Karl the Cat finds Friends
description:
I challenged myself to make a game in 24 hours straight. Checkout my devlog here!

You play as my Kitten Karl who is trying to save 4 kittens. To find these kittens you will need to fling yourself in a given direction to platform around various zones. Once you've saved a kitten you will be granted a new ability. Part platformer, part game from hell, will there be bugs!? You bet there will be. Do I care, not for a second. You might just need to reload the game and start over, but hey you choose to play this game.. mwahahaha.

Controls:

  • Move mouse around to aim
  • Left-Click to apply force in direction of mouse
  • Hold Left-Click to charge up Jump
  • See more notes on the abilities below if you want to be spoiled

Tips:

  • Once you come to rest, wait for a little bit before you click again to fling the cat. Sometimes the charge up won't work and that's just part of playing a free game that was made in 24 hrs.

Proudly made with the Godot Engine

Devlog for making this in 24 hours:

To prepare for Ludam Dare 50 on April 1st 2022, I challenged myself to make a game in 24 hours without knowing the theme. I had to make all my own art assets and at least 1 audio asset. My friend came up with the Theme for me. This was a very hard challenge and it got the best of me. But I feel more prepared for LD50.

Ability Spoilers Below:

  • Bonk: can ram into certain walls to break them. Unlocked after the first kitten is rescued
  • Wall Cling: Press and hold SPACE bar when colliding with platform. The stamina bar will reduce as you cling and you will fall when it reaches zero. There is a slight delay for the recharge. This is unlocked after the second kitten is saved.
  • Mega Pounce: Collide with the BLUE squares to empower the next jump. These blue squares will respond after some time. The next jump will be twice as strong. This is unlocked after the third kitten is recused.
